commit.title: Add support to publish all tormenta's modules with Scala 2.12
fixes #59. Apply withHandler so that handlers propagate through map, filter and flatMap.
registerMetricHandlers to call a function1 on spout open
Make sure the tes tlibs are just in test
Revert back to the version for just the update
Upgrades to scala 2.11 and moves to scala test
Removing kryo import from chill, adding local Externalizer to not use setReferences (see https://github.com/twitter/chill/issues/173)
Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:twitter/tormenta into kgonina/storm_spout_metric_aitools-699
Proxy for IRichSpout to enable overriding of methods
removing .toList from now immutable metricFactory list
getSpout(transformer, metrics), SchemeSpout extends BaseSpout, for Spout open override & registermetric fix
Add a hook to register spout metrics
Adds AvroTraversableSpouts for testing Avro Record with SummingBird
Added test to cover Scheme.withHandler usecase
Adds various Avro schemes for both specific and generic Avro records
whoops, flatMap the tuple list, not the items.
remove chill and serializations. bump to scala 2.9.3
Update KafkaSpout to use proper spout ID.
Actually just remove bijection, we hardly use it
upgrade to storm version that allows flatmap.
add dependency on chill. Put decoder in the meatlocker.
Fixes scalac option to deal with storm issue

issues.title: SchemeSpout doesn't handle callOnOpen properly
Release Tormenta 0.9.0
Scheme.apply disregards the handle method
Externalizer in tormenta shouldn't be needed anymore
Don't ignore old data in kafka
Mark storm in tormenta as provided to stop its dependencies leaking
Default handler is to ignore. Remove that
Release tormenta 0.5.3 so that it can be used in SummingBird
Possible bug
Native Scala Impl of KafkaSpout
Add a TickSpout
Wiki Page on Tormenta-Twitter w/ example
Tormenta needs an explicit dep on bijection in Build.scala
KafkaSpout should move to tormenta-kafka
Injection[Tuple*,StormTuple]
Upgrade to bijection 0.3.0 and use Injection for serialization.
Merge with ScalaStorm
Add a cross build against 2.10.
ScalaScheme should return a Try on deserialize failure
BijectionScheme should actually be a function scheme.
add flatMap to ScalaScheme
Replace Option with Either in ScalaScheme
Move ScalaSpout to spout subpackage, ScalaScheme to scheme subpackage
Add Scala-friendly testing library to Tormenta
Integrate Scalding tuple conversion library
